snippet: Following a gift of Cubist artworks valued at more than $1 billion, the Metropolitan Museum of Art is looking to improve its layout.
abstract: Metropolitan Museum of Art is planning to rebuild its wing for Modern and contemporary art--possibly from scratch--to create new, showcase galleries for its expanded collection from those periods; planned new wing is part of the first comprehensive re-examination of museum's layout in 40 years; follows gift of Cubist artworks valued at more than $1 billion.
lead_paragraph: Following a gift of Cubist artworks valued at more than $1 billion, the Metropolitan Museum of Art is looking to improve its layout.

headline.main: Met Plans a Gut Renovation of Its Modern Wing
headline.print_headline: Met Plans a Gut Renovation of Its Modern Wing
